entry.title: Protect + Defend PCK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spore Life
Type: hidden
Price: 1000.00

Consider this a bodyguard for your immune system. Our bodies are under constant threat from viruses, bacteria, and pathogens looking to infect our cells and wreak havoc. There’s no better way to stop them in their tracks than by fortifying your body’s natural defense system.

PROTECT + DEFEND is an adaptogenic blend of Turkey Tail, Chaga, Reishi, and Maitake mushrooms designed for supercharged immune function and longevity. Its robust profile of antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals will support your overall health and keep your body’s defense operating at its full capacity. 

You may not live for 1,000 years, but you can certainly thrive for 100. Keep yourself protected every day with this potent defensive blend.

entry.title: Mike's Mushroom Mix PCK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spore Life
Type: hidden
Price: 29.95

The one that started it all. Mike’s signature blend brings together ten of the most renowned functional mushrooms into an all-around daily supplement. This formula contains a diverse and robust nutrient profile to maintain balance and harmony in all of your systems within your body. If you’re interested in using functional mushrooms to support your overall health and wellness, this is the supplement for you. 

It’s a potent anti-inflammatory, anti-viral, and immunity booster that’ll keep harmful pathogens in check and keep your body in an optimal state of balance. Our co-founder Mike spent years finding the right mushroom blend for total body health. Then we combined that research with the highest quality mushroom ingredients on the planet to bring you this unique, comprehensive formula. 

Keep your body optimized, healthy, and vibrant with Mike’s powerful everyday blend.

entry.title: Focus Performance PCK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spore Life
Type: hidden
Price: 49.95

The brain fuel you need to perform at your best. This blend combines the cognitive boosting power of Lion’s Mane with sustained energy from Cordyceps to help you unlock your peak mental performance each day.

The functional mushrooms in FOCUS PERFORMANCE are supported by Ashwagandha and Ginkgo Biloba to provide increased cognitive enhancement and a mood-stabilizing effect. The result is improved working memory, expanded creativity, and complete support for your brain’s neurological functioning. On top of all that, Lion’s Mane has proven neuroprotective benefits. Your mind will thank you later… 

Put your head down, get into that elusive flow state (aka “the zone”), and get sh*t done.

entry.title: Energy Performance PCK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spore Life
Type: hidden
Price: 49.95

Need to smash that tough deadline at work? Crush that exam? Hit a new PR at the gym? This energy blend combines the power of functional mushrooms with natural energy enhancers to keep you running at peak performance –– even on your toughest days.

This potent formula is centered around the Cordyceps mushroom, which has a history that spans millennia across ancient Chinese and Tibetan cultures. Cordyceps is revered as a treatment for many illnesses, along with providing a substantial energy boost for people trekking through the Himalayas. With its scientifically proven ability to help the lungs absorb oxygen more efficiently at the cellular level, this potent mushroom will provide you with increased endurance and energy whenever you need it.

entry.title: Chill Out PCK
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spore Life
Type: hidden
Price: 49.95

Are you looking to take the edge off at the end of a long day? This calming, anti-stress blend provides exactly what your body and mind needs to slip into that sweet relaxation at the end of the day. 

Reishi –– the Mushroom of Immortality –– is typically used as an adaptogen to help the body process stress and is at the core of this powerful formula. The result is a calming effect that, when combined with potent natural herbs like Chamomile, Lemon Balm, Valerian Root, and Passion Flower Extract, allows you to easily melt away the stresses of the day.

Enjoy this blend in the evening and flood your body with tranquility so you’re ready to enjoy a deep, restorative sleep every night.
